name: Escape The Maze (Sparrow.exe)
description:
You find yourself in a strange maze populated by even stranger things. An ominous book informs you that you require three keys in order to escape. Can you escape the maze?

My first game, hopefully there will be many more in the future. Please tell me your thoughts on what you like or dislike so I may improve in the future. I love all feedback, thank you.
